text: Magny-Cours is a commune in the Nièvre department in central France. It is best known as the home of the Circuit de Nevers Magny-Cours, a famous Auto racing circuit. It formerly hosted the Formula One French Grand Prix. A campus of the Institut supérieur de l'automobile et des transports is also located on the city. ==Related pages== *Communes of the Nièvre department ==References== * INSEE commune file ==Other websites== * Circuit de Nevers Magny-Cours Category:Communes in Nièvre
title: Magny-Cours
